name: Kokonut Studio
tagline: Interactive studio focused on emerging tech
description:
Kokonut is an interactive studio that focuses on emerging technology, we like to build engaging apps, games and second screen experiences for everyone.
There are many questions that need answers before the first line of code is written or the first sketch is painted. We can help you focus on what’s important. Kokonut works with you from start to finish, helping to materialize your vision.
